title: (BONUS EP) Charlie Crimes
description:
This month, the gals deliver a very specific fan pick topic with some seriously dark cases. Topics include a knife-wielding serial killer, a family's fatal secret, and a violent Elvis wannabe. Get yourself a particularly dry glass of Charles & Charles Rosé, consider going by your full name, and tune in for Charlie Crimes.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit:
https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
